instructions: Simple Fate Accelerated Character Sheet.Based off of Devindra Payment (Ardnived) Fate core character sheetwith modifications to more closely mirror the [Evilhat official character sheet](http://www.evilhat.com/home/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/Fate-Accelerated-Character-Sheet.pdf)Update by G. Ti: I added a Fallout fan version.Click on the top button to transform.
